name: mementos
description: Mementos is a VS Code extension that enhances productivity by providing visual cues and easy navigation to your important areas with specific and configurable comments.

mementos.comment.triggerWord.description: The trigger word that will determine if the comment is a memento. Default is `@@`: // @@ title

mementos.comment.triggerWordSeparator.description: The separator between trigger word and title. Default is a space: ` `: // @@ title

mementos.comment.colorizeComment.description: Whether or not to colorize the memento text.

mementos.actions.insertMementoWithContex.description: Whether or not to add context when inserting a memento.

mementos.actions.defaultContextTitle.description: Default title that will be placed in mementos with context.

mementos.gutter.defaultColor.description: Default RGB color for mementos that doesn't fit a text criteria. Default 220,220,220
mementos.gutter.defaultColor.errorMessage: Invalid RGB color. Please enter a valid RGB color in the format 'R,G,B', where R, G, and B are integers between 0 and 255.

mementos.gutter.mementoTitles.red.description: A list of trigger words. When any of these words is found in a memento, it will become of this color.

mementos.gutter.mementoTitles.orange.description: A list of trigger words. When any of these words is found in a memento, it will become of this color.

mementos.gutter.mementoTitles.yellow.description: A list of trigger words. When any of these words is found in a memento, it will become of this color.
